long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: sumtab helps you manage information overload by intelligently summarizing your open tabs using ChatGPT. Perfect for research, studying, or managing multiple articles. Select any number of tabs and get concise, readable summaries instantly.
